sub_title: Investment Manager at Fashion For Good
summary: An experienced Investment Manager with a keen interest in sustainable agriculture and impact investing. I have a strong ability to identify investment opportunities, analyse risks, manage both internal and external stakeholders and build lasting professional relationships.
